_comment: Smart Mutation Tool v2.1 - Configuration Template
_docs: See README.md, QUICK_START.md and CONFIG_GUIDE.md for comprehensive documentation

_field_explanations.inputPaths: Array of file/directory paths to analyze. Supports glob patterns like ['lib/**/*.dart', 'bin/**/*.dart']
_field_explanations.outputDir: Directory where reports and mutated files will be saved. Created if it doesn't exist.
_field_explanations.mutationTypes: Types of mutations to apply: arithmetic (+,-,*,/,%), logical (&&,||,!), relational (==,!=,>,<,>=,<=), datatype (int,double,String,bool,List,Set,Map), increment (++,--), functionCall (print,add,length,toString)
_field_explanations.enableTracking: Add '@ MUTATION: type' comments to mutated code for tracking. Set false for cleaner output.
_field_explanations.useCumulative: true=Apply ALL mutations to single files (recommended), false=Create separate files per mutation type
_field_explanations.runTests: false=Quick analysis only, true=Run tests and analyze mutation detection rates
_field_explanations.testCommand: Command to execute tests (required if runTests=true). Examples: 'dart test', 'flutter test'
_field_explanations.verbose: CONTROLS JSON GENERATION: false=Clean output with HTML only (production), true=Detailed output with JSON reports (debug). JSON files ONLY generated when verbose=true
_field_explanations.parallel: false=Single-threaded (safer), true=Multi-threaded (faster). Enable for large codebases.
_field_explanations.maxThreads: Maximum parallel threads if parallel=true. Recommended: 2-4 for most systems.
_field_explanations.excludePatterns: Glob patterns for files to exclude. Prevents mutation of test files and generated code.
_field_explanations.includePatterns: Glob patterns for files to include. Usually just ['**/*.dart'] for all Dart files.
_field_explanations.lineRanges: Apply mutations to specific line ranges: {'file_path': {'start': 10, 'end': 50}}. Leave {} for entire files.
_field_explanations.reportFormat: Report output format. Currently only 'html' supported (GitHub-style reports with diff visualization).
